Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute at 63rd/Stony Island
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Stony Island, 63rd, Lake Shore Drive, 57th & Hyde Park, due to street blockage near 63rd/Stony Island.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Stony Island, 63rd, Lake Shore Drive, 57th & Hyde Park, due to street blockage near 63rd/Stony Island.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #2 Hyde Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Ohio/Michigan
ShortDescription: Northbound 2 Hyde Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Chicago Ave & Fairbanks: due to, police activity near Ohio/Michigan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #2 Hyde Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Chicago Ave & Fairbanks: due to, police activity near Ohio/Michigan.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line & Loop-bound Pink Line trains bypassing Morgan
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line & Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running, but not stopping at Morgan due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line & Loop-bound Pink Line trains are running, but not stopping at Morgan due to police activity.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
